rooms.description: The entrance is designed with a north-facing entry to maximize positive energy. The entrance hall features minimalistic decor and directs visitors towards the central courtyard.
An open-plan living space that merges with the kitchen area, adorned with floor-to-ceiling windows to allow ample natural light and maintain a connection with the courtyard.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area, featuring modern appliances while respecting traditional Kerala aesthetics. The layout ensures efficient flow and connectivity to the courtyard.
The master bedroom is designed with ample window space and a private balcony overlooking the central courtyard, ensuring tranquility and privacy in accordance with Vastu principles.
A comfortable guest bedroom that retains a traditional Kerala feel with subtle modern touches, ensuring harmony and balance in the overall design.
Serves as a private bathroom for both bedrooms. It is designed with a functional layout and traditional Kerala styling, integrating natural materials.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring maximum natural light and ventilation throughout the house.
North-facing entrance door aligned with Vastu principles for prosperity and positive energy flow.
Access from living areas to the central courtyard, enhancing spatial connectivity and traditional Kerala design aesthetics.
